name: Capitão

biography.description: Capitão uses a Tactical Crossbow that fires asphyxiating bolts that burn oxygen within a small area, and smoke bolts that create instant cover.

gameplayTips: Use asphyxiating bolts to flush defenders out of tight corners and behind shields.
Create instant smoke cover with smoke bolts when planting the defuser or crossing dangerous angles.
The crossbow makes no sound when fired, allowing for stealthy area denial.
Coordinate with teammates to capitalize on defenders forced out of position by your bolts.
